backend/main.mo: Minimal actor with no state or backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to implementation files and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files for quick reference.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and OKLCH-based theme tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading Quicksand font and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component providing timer modes, settings sheets, background and music integration.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/Backgr: UI for setting backgrounds via upload, URL, or YouTube with brightness and volume controls.
Context provider wrapping useBackground and handling blob URL lifecycle cleanup.
Renders image, video, or YouTube backgrounds with brightness control and error handling. Manages playback issues and clears invalid backgrounds.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/loadYo: Loads the YouTube IFrame API once and exposes a promise that resolves when ready. Defines basic TypeScript types for the YouTube player.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/mediaS: Provides helpers to infer media types, validate URLs, probe image/video loadability, and create user‑friendly media error messages. Also extracts file extensions from URLs.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/useBac: Manages background state with persistence, URL validation, media probing, and YouTube handling. Restores stored backgrounds after validating they still load.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/YouTub: Creates and sizes a YouTube iframe player for background playback with autoplay, volume control, and error reporting. Handles player initialization and viewport resizing.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/youtub: Parses YouTube URLs to extract video IDs and builds embed URLs with autoplay and loop settings. Supports multiple YouTube URL formats with error reporting.
frontend/src/features/music/MusicProvide: Provides a context for music playback state and actions including source, volume, errors, and audio ref. Wraps children with the music context from useMusic.
frontend/src/features/music/MusicSetting: UI for setting music URL, clearing playback, and adjusting volume using context state.
frontend/src/features/music/MusicStage.t: Handles actual playback via hidden audio or Spotify/Apple embeds and reports load errors.
frontend/src/features/music/musicSupport: Parses URLs to classify music sources and generate embed URLs or direct audio links.
frontend/src/features/music/useMusic.ts: Manages music state, persistence, parsing, playback settings, and audio ref handling.
frontend/src/features/publishShare/Publi: Provides a sheet to copy or open the current URL and shows publishing instructions.
frontend/src/features/publishShare/useIs: Detects whether the app is running inside an iframe to adjust sharing behavior.
frontend/src/features/timers/countdown/C: Countdown timer UI with start, pause, reset, and duration editing controls.
frontend/src/features/timers/countdown/u: Implements countdown logic with persistence, pausing, resetting, and precise interval updates.
frontend/src/features/timers/interval/In: UI component for an interval timer allowing start, pause, skip, reset, and editing interval and round settings.
frontend/src/features/timers/interval/us: Hook managing interval timer logic, state persistence, countdown behavior, and interval/round transitions.
frontend/src/features/timers/pomodoro/Po: UI component for a Pomodoro timer with work/break cycles, controls, and editable durations.
frontend/src/features/timers/pomodoro/us: Hook implementing Pomodoro cycle logic, persistence, segment switching, and countdown handling.
frontend/src/features/timers/repeating/R: UI component for a repeating countdown timer with configurable duration, repeats, and infinite mode.
frontend/src/features/timers/repeating/u: Hook containing logic for repeating countdowns, handling repeats, persistence, and timing updates.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/Edit: Reusable numeric input allowing free typing with validation and clamping on blur.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/Rota: A draggable rotary dial UI component that converts pointer rotation into a numeric value and updates via onChange.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/time: Provides helper functions to format seconds or milliseconds into human‑readable time strings.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/useA: React hook that runs a callback on a precise interval while a running flag is true.
frontend/src/features/timers/stopwatch/S: UI for a stopwatch timer with start, pause, reset, and lap recording, displaying elapsed time and lap list.
frontend/src/features/timers/stopwatch/u: Hook implementing stopwatch logic including timing, laps, and integration with an accurate interval.
frontend/src/features/timers/visibility/: A bottom bar with a button to toggle timer visibility, showing different icons based on state.
Manages persisted timer visibility state with auto‑hide behavior and toggle handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating related queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading identities, handling login, logout, and status.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup plus custom theme variables and utility classes, including rotary dial and timer styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom theme extensions, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing current issues with background loading, existing features for auto-clearing broken backgrounds, and notes for recovery behavior.
